title: AceBetGroup
author: AceBetGroup
created_time: November 01, 2023, 12:34:15 PMLast edit: November 01, 2023, 12:48:50 PM by AceBetGroup
content: Dear Online Businessmen,We're excited to announce our exclusive SEO service packages designed to meet the needs of businesses of all sizes and budgets. Whether you're just starting out or looking to expand your online presence, we have the perfect package for you. Take a look at our three affordable and comprehensive packages:Starter Package ($99)Perfect for small businesses and startups looking to establish a solid online presence.Comprehensive website audit to identify areas for improvement.Keyword research and optimization for up to 10 target keywords.On-page optimization, including meta tags, headings, and content optimization.Basic link building to improve your website's authority.Monthly progress report and analysis.Advanced Package ($299)Ideal for businesses aiming to increase their online visibility and attract more targeted traffic.Detailed website audit with recommendations for enhanced performance.Extensive keyword research and optimization for up to 20 target keywords.On-page optimization, including meta tags, headings, content optimization, and URL structure optimization.Advanced link building strategies to boost your website's authority.Monthly progress report with in-depth analysis and actionable insights.Premium Package ($600)Tailored for businesses seeking maximum online exposure and exponential growth.Comprehensive website audit with detailed recommendations for improved user experience and conversions.Extensive keyword research and optimization for up to 30 target keywords.On-page optimization, including meta tags, headings, content optimization, URL structure optimization, and schema markup implementation.Advanced link building techniques, including outreach to high-authority websites and guest posting.Monthly progress report with detailed analysis, competitor analysis, and strategic recommendations for further growth.Please note that the above packages are customizable, and we can tailor them specifically to your unique requirements. Our goal is to deliver exceptional results that align with your business objectives and budget.Don't miss out on the opportunity to enhance your online presence and attract quality organic traffic. Contact us today at https://t.me/bukowzki to discuss your specific needs and let us help you choose the perfect SEO service package for your business.Remember, investing in SEO is investing in the long-term success of your business. Take the first step towards dominating the search engine rankings and watch your online presence soar!Warm Regards,Payment: We accept BTC and escrowFor more information or in case of slow reply on the forum, you can get a quick answer on our telegram:https://t.me/bukowzkiCharles Bukowski,Bukowski Marketing

comments.author: irfan_pak10
comments.body: Is it possible you can share your past work with us? As you are new here, Sharing some of your past work and anything that will help people to trust what you say you can do is true.

comments.author: AceBetGroup
comments.body: Thanks for the advice,Here you go:https://i.ibb.co/fkYbZ6w/proof1.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/nb6s9mB/proof2.png - Fairly new project so DA will scale graduallyhttps://i.ibb.co/WWFh1Ss/proof3.pngDo not hesitate to contact me for more detail

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: AceBetGroup on November 01, 2023, 05:45:07 PMHere you go: - Fairly new project so DA will scale graduallyIsn't it better to give the website urls so that anyone who is interested can see the position of the website for the keywords it is targeting. How will we know that you were behind the success of the sites? Do you have your own site that is ranked too?Sorry for all these questions because unless you have a detailed portfolio, it's hard to believe that you will deliver which you are promising. There used to be a time when it was easy to make the customers dump but these days it's hard.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: AceBetGroup on November 01, 2023, 05:45:07 PMThanks for the advice,Here you go: - Fairly new project so DA will scale graduallyDo not hesitate to contact me for more detail This doesn't prove anything anyone can extract images from the internet and make them his own without giving us the domains of your clients for us to check, you cannot prove that your service is really good based on what you posted on your announcement if you checked all the other SEO companies they proudly post the logo and links of their clients.This is standard SEO practice you are known by the companies you worked with and how you deliver the results if you cannot post the domains of your clients people will suspect you are in this business or your clients did not get the results that they pay you.
